verses.verse: Be not you <S%H7065>envious<s%> against <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H582>men<s%>, neither desire to be with <S%H183>them<s%>.
For their <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H1897>studies<s%> <S%H7701>destruction<s%>, and their <S%H8193>lips<s%> <S%H1696>talk<s%> of <S%H5999>mischief<s%>.
Through <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> is a <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%>; and by <S%H8394>understanding<s%> it is <S%H3559>established<s%>:
And by <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> shall the <S%H2315>chambers<s%> be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with all <S%H3368>precious<s%> and <S%H5273>pleasant<s%> <S%H1952>riches<s%>.
A <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H1397>man<s%> is <S%H5797>strong<s%>; <S%H376>Yes<s%>, a man of <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> <S%H553>increases<s%> <S%H3581>strength<s%>.
For by wise <S%H8458>counsel<s%> you shall <S%H6213>make<s%> your <S%H4421>war<s%>: and in <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H3289>counselors<s%> there is <S%H8668>safety<s%>.
<S%H2454>Wisdom<s%> is too <S%H7311>high<s%> for a <S%H191>fool<s%>: he <S%H6605>opens<s%> not his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate<s%>.
He that <S%H2803>devises<s%> to do <S%H7489>evil<s%> shall be <S%H7121>called<s%> a <S%H4209>mischievous<s%> <S%H1167>person<s%>.
The <S%H2154>thought<s%> of <S%H200>foolishness<s%> is <S%H2403>sin<s%>: and the <S%H3887>scorner<s%> is a <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to <S%H120>men<s%>.
If you <S%H7503>faint<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6869>adversity<s%>, your <S%H3581>strength<s%> is <S%H6862>small<s%>.
If you <S%H2820>forbear<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> them that are <S%H3947>drawn<s%> unto <S%H4194>death<s%>, and those that are <S%H4131>ready<s%> to be <S%H2027>slain<s%>;

If you <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H3045>Behold<s%>, we knew it <S%H8505>not<s%>; does not he that ponders the <S%H3826>heart<s%> <S%H995>consider<s%> <S%H5341>it<s%>? and he that keeps your <S%H5315>soul<s%>, does not he <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H7725>it<s%>? and shall not he render to every <S%H120>man<s%> according to his <S%H6467>works<s%>?
My <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H398>eat<s%> you <S%H1706>honey<s%>, because it is <S%H2896>good<s%>; and the <S%H5317>honeycomb<s%>, which is <S%H4966>sweet<s%> to your <S%H2441>taste<s%>:

So shall the <S%H3045>knowledge<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> be unto your <S%H5315>soul<s%>: when you have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3426>it<s%>, then there shall be a <S%H319>reward<s%>, and your <S%H8615>expectation<s%> shall not be cut <S%H3772>off<s%>.
Lay not in <S%H693>wait<s%>, O <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H5116>man<s%>, against the living of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>; <S%H7703>plunder<s%> not his resting <S%H7258>place<s%>:
For a <S%H6662>just<s%> man <S%H5307>falls<s%> seven <S%H7651>times<s%>, and rises up <S%H6965>again<s%>: but the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall <S%H3782>fall<s%> into <S%H7451>mischief<s%>.
<S%H8055>Rejoice<s%> not when your <S%H341>enemy<s%> <S%H5307>falls<s%>, and let not your <S%H3820>heart<s%> be <S%H1523>glad<s%> when he <S%H3782>stumbles<s%>:
Lest the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H7489>it<s%>, and it displease <S%H7725>him<s%>, and he turn away his wrath from <S%H639>him<s%>.
<S%H2734>Fret<s%> not yourself because of <S%H7489>evil<s%> <S%H7065>men<s%>, neither be you envious at the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>;
For there shall be no <S%H319>reward<s%> to the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H5216>man<s%>; the candle of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall be put <S%H1846>out<s%>.
My <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H3372>fear<s%> you the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%>: and <S%H6148>meddle<s%> not with them that are given to <S%H8138>change<s%>:
For their <S%H343>calamity<s%> shall <S%H6965>rise<s%> <S%H6597>suddenly<s%>; and who <S%H3045>knows<s%> the <S%H6365>ruin<s%> of them <S%H8147>both<s%>?
These things also belong to the <S%H2450>wise<s%>. It is not <S%H2896>good<s%> to have <S%H5234>respect<s%> of <S%H6440>persons<s%> in <S%H4941>judgment<s%>.
He that <S%H559>says<s%> unto the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>, You are <S%H6662>righteous<s%>; him shall the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5344>curse<s%>, <S%H3816>nations<s%> shall abhor <S%H2194>him<s%>:
But to them that <S%H3198>rebuke<s%> him shall be <S%H5276>delight<s%>, and a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1293>blessing<s%> shall come upon <S%H935>them<s%>.
Every man shall <S%H5401>kiss<s%> his <S%H8193>lips<s%> that <S%H7725>gives<s%> a <S%H5228>right<s%> <S%H1697>answer<s%>.

<S%H3559>Prepare<s%> your <S%H4399>work<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%>, and make it <S%H6257>fit<s%> for yourself in the <S%H7704>field<s%>; and <S%H310>afterwards<s%> <S%H1129>build<s%> your <S%H1004>house<s%>.
Be not a <S%H5707>witness<s%> against your <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> without <S%H2600>cause<s%>; and <S%H6601>deceive<s%> not with your <S%H8193>lips<s%>.
<S%H559>Say<s%> <S%H6213>not<s%>, I will do so to him as he has <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H7725>me<s%>: I will render to the <S%H376>man<s%> according to his <S%H6467>work<s%>.
I <S%H5674>went<s%> by the <S%H7704>field<s%> of the <S%H376>slothful<s%>, and by the <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> of the <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H2638>void<s%> of <S%H3820>understanding<s%>;

<S%H5927>And<s%>, behold, it was all grown over with <S%H7063>thorns<s%>, and <S%H2738>nettles<s%> had <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H68>there<s%>, and the stone <S%H1444>wall<s%> there was broken <S%H2040>down<s%>.
Then I <S%H2372>saw<s%>, and considered it <S%H7896>well<s%>: I <S%H7200>looked<s%> upon <S%H3947>it<s%>, and received <S%H4148>instruction<s%>.
Yet a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H8142>sleep<s%>, a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H8572>slumber<s%>, a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H2264>folding<s%> of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> to <S%H7901>sleep<s%>:
So shall your <S%H7389>poverty<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> as one that <S%H1980>travels<s%>; and your <S%H4270>want<s%> as a <S%H4043>armed<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>.
